question: You would like to participate in a work-related seminar in another country. Write a letter to the person in charge of the seminar. In your letter:Ask for detailed information regarding the program contents.Cost of the program and any discounts for company-sponsored professionals.Provision of accommodation during the program.
text: I am writing this letter to request some information regarding the conference that your organisation is going to conduct in Ontario, Canada, as advertised in The Canada times. I am hoping that you would provide me with these details as soon as possible so that I can book my seat for the workshop.
First off, I would like to know the exact schedule of the symposium to sanction the leaves from my work. Is there any prerequisite to attend the conclave? If so, what are they?
Secondly, the venue details with a navigational map would be highly appreciated as, I will be travelling to Ontario for the first time.

Finally, who would be responsible for the accommodation – the participants themselves or your organisation?  What will be the total cost for a participant from the India and if there is any early bird discount provided that booking is done well in advance?
I am hoping to receive an early reply. Your help and time will be highly appreciated.

error_list.error_des: It appears that you have an unnecessary comma after the subordinating conjunction as. Consider removing the comma.
Your article usage with the geographic name India may be incorrect.
